## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G29140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G29140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABS3, ADP1, ADS1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis abnormal shoot3, ALTERED DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM 1, ACTIVATED DISEASE SUSCEPTIBILITY 1
- **Description:**   MATE efflux family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2119941
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
